subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace in Jaipur was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
question_hi: जयपुर महाराज़ांग इन्स्तंभ से कौन-सा बनाया गया था ?
explanation_en:
Amer Fort is a famous palace, but Hawa Mahal is the palace built by Maharaja Pratap Singh of Amer. The correct answer is 'B', Hawa Mahal.

In Hindi: Amer Fort se baad mein Hawa Mahal banaye gaya tha, lekin Hawa Mahal Maharaja Pratap Singh ka hai. Roop ki rachna, Hawa Mahal se banaye gaya hai.

हवा महाल से बाद में Amer Fort banaya gaya tha, lekin Hawa Mahal Maharaja Pratap Singh ka hai. Roop ki rachna, Hawa Mahal se banaye gaya hai.
